value.desc: The value of the tab to be selected or is selected

align.desc: The type of the alignment for the tabs within the tabs container

breakpoint.desc: An screen width minimum value, at which the tabs automatically justify across the whole width of the screen

active-color.desc: The color to be attributed to the text of the active tab

active-bg-color.desc: The color to be attributed to the background of the active tab

indicatorColor.desc: The color to be attributed to the indicator (the underline) of the active tab

left-icon.desc: The name of an icon, to replace the default arrow used to scroll through the tabs to the left, when the tabs extend past the width of the screen

right-icon.desc: The name of an icon, to replace the default arrow used to scroll through the tabs to the right, when the tabs extend past the width of the screen

top-indicator.desc: Allows the indicator to be placed above the tab, instead of below it

narrow-indicator.desc: Allows the indicator to be the same width of the tab's content, instead of the whole width of the tab

inline-label.desc: Allows the text to be inline with the icon, should one be used

no-caps.desc: Allows the first letter of the tab labels to be capitalized, instead of all letters being capitalized (which is the default)

dense.desc: Allows the tabs to be condensed to a smaller height
